document_data.name: Dragonblood Affinity
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragonblood affinity''''' was a spell that was used by [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell significantly increased the strength of a targeted dragonic creature. This spell could only be cast by dragons or other draconic creatures.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
